data.description: Beautifully upgraded and maintained home in vibrant South Fulton. This expansive home features 5 BRs, 4 1/2 BAs, and full finished basement on level lot. The main level boasts 2 story living room with 10ft ceilings and custom craftsman woodwork. Separate dining room with coffered ceiling, family room with fireplace and gorgeous chef's kitchen. Kitchen highlights stainless steel gas cooktop and double ovens, granite countertops, island, and walk-in pantry. Main level is complete with bedroom and full bathroom. The second level include extensive Owner's Suite with vaulted ceilings, sitting room with fireplace, separate walk-in closets, and bathroom with double vanity and separate shower and bathtub. A loft and 3 additional bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the second level. The full finished basement is a show stopper with theater, hair salon, computer room, & 1/2 bathroom. Convenient to restaurants, shopping, outdoor recreation, and all that South Fulton has to offer. Schedule a showing today!
